raw_text: EXEC DIRECTOR OF SALES, CONSULTANT, STRATEGIST           Executive Profile     10+ year proven track record in Digital, Mobile, and Social, Business Development & Sales Leadership experience, working with top tier clients and agencies in revenue generation, sales team management, across Retail, CPG, QSR, Electronics, Entertainment, among other verticals, leading sales teams to exceeding quota and new market expansion       Skill Highlights          Business development leader  Sales team management  Revenue and market expansion  Self-motivated      Leadership/communication skills  Negotiations expert  Market research and analysis  Customer-oriented            Core Accomplishments      Sales    Management and Leadership  :     Built and managed sales teams to over $25MM in annual quota achievement  Business Development leadership in     Business Development Expertise  :     Spearheaded programs which increased revenues 150% YoY and successfully expanded into new markets and territories         Professional Experience      Exec Director of Sales, Consultant, Strategist      Current     Company Name   －   City  ,   State      Work with clients and agencies to build and implement in-market strategies and extend revenue streams across digital, mobile, and social messaging channels   Drive revenue across Retail, CPG, e-Commerce, Technology, and Entertainment clients   Manage and Develop go-to-market strategies and positioning to achieve optimal goals   Build Mobile + Social Planning, Marketing & Messaging Strategies via Multi-Platform and Omni-Channel execution, also to be executed digitally via live on-the-ground events   Develop and Strengthen Strategic Partnerships across disciplines and tech partner organizations. Newhouse School of Public Communications          GPA:   GPA: 3.8     GPA: 3.8   Media Communications and Film Production/Direction         Skills     Sales Management,   Business Development and Strategy, Client and Agency Focus, Creative Development, e-Commerce, Forecasting, Leadership, Managing, Marketing, Messaging, Positioning, Process Driven, Reporting and Analytics
story:
Let me transform this resume into a narrative story:

Meet a dynamic sales executive with over a decade of experience in the digital world. After graduating from Syracuse University's prestigious Newhouse School with a degree in Media Communications and Film Production, they began their journey in the media industry as a Commercial Producer, working with top Madison Avenue agencies to bring Fortune 500 companies' visions to life.

Their career took an exciting turn when they moved into digital media advertising sales, where they cut their teeth at MTV Networks, crafting compelling cross-platform campaigns for their MTVU properties. Success came quickly as they developed a knack for building strong relationships with agencies and clients.

As their expertise grew, they took on increasingly challenging roles. As Manager of Eastern Sales and Business Development, they consistently exceeded sales goals, closing major deals with retail giants like Walmart and tech leaders like HP. Their ability to produce results caught attention, leading to a position as Senior Director of Sales, where they worked with prestigious agencies like Mediavest and Mindshare, managing campaigns for household names including VH1, Bose, and Coca-Cola.

The mobile revolution presented new opportunities, and they seized them as VP, Senior Director of Mobile Sales and Strategy. Under their leadership, revenues grew by an impressive 150% year over year. While building their career, they also pursued an MBA at Fordham University, graduating with an outstanding 3.9 GPA in 2012.

Their journey continued as they managed regional sales teams, overseeing $25 million in annual revenue and consistently delivering 115% of goals. Today, they serve as an Executive Director of Sales and Strategy Consultant, helping clients navigate the complex landscape of digital, mobile, and social messaging channels.

Throughout their career, they've demonstrated a remarkable ability to build and lead high-performing teams, develop strategic partnerships, and drive revenue growth across various industries. Their story is one of continuous evolution, from traditional media to cutting-edge digital strategies, always staying ahead of industry trends while delivering exceptional results for their clients and organizations.

What makes them particularly unique is their combination of creative background, business acumen, and technical expertise – a rare blend that allows them to understand both the artistic and analytical aspects of modern marketing and sales.
